Mozalago Ventures

Empowering exceptional ventures in Madagascar and beyond through strategic investments, operational support, and cultural insight.

What We Do

Mozalago Ventures is a privately owned company based in Madagascar. We specialize in the development and management of short-term rental properties, boutique hospitality concepts, and local service ventures. Our aim is to create value through impactful, locally grounded, and resilient business models.

Our Philosophy

We believe in conscious entrepreneurship. Our approach prioritizes sustainability, cultural sensitivity, and long-term impact over short-term gains. We act as an anchor for investors and project developers looking to navigate the Malagasy business landscape with trust, transparency, and tailored support.

Flagship Project

Villa Kitoko

Located on the remote southwest coast of Madagascar, Villa Kitoko is an eco-designed beachfront retreat operated by Mozalago. The villa blends Afro-chic aesthetics with natural materials, providing a premium hospitality experience fully integrated with local ecosystems and communities.

Visit: www.villakitoko.com
